Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records
Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records

Awards Files document the awards events planned or sponsored by Sports Illustrated. The majority of awards in the files were given by SI, specifically the Sportsman or Sportswoman of the Year and the Silver Anniversary All-American Award presented to collegiate football players 25 years after graduation who have since made outstanding social or professional contributions.
